message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you for $20,000. I believe it holds significant value and can greatly benefit you.
I'm interested in the product, but $20,000 is a bit out of my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $12,000. Would you be willing to consider this price?
Bob, I appreciate your interest.  While $20,000 represents the value this product brings, I'm willing to come down to $18,000.  I believe this offer is a fair compromise.

I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but $18,000 is still a bit steep for me. I was thinking more along the lines of $14,000. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to be within my budget.
